item.description:
Discover the brand new Bruce Freeman Rail Trail. Phase 1 begins in Chelmsford at the Lowell/Chelmsford line, near Cross Point, passes through Chelmsford Center, and ends at Rt. 225 in Westford. This part of the trail covers a stretch of 6.8 miles. a round trip from one end to the other and back will be an easy 13.6 miles.

Park and meet in the rear of the parking lot at 5 Cushing Pl., Chelmsford, adjacent to the trail. This lot is at the intersection of Rts 27 and 110, and I believe it can be accessed from either road.

There is a restaurant in this parking area where we can grab a bite to eat afterwards.

Map, photos and updates on phases 2 and 3 can be found at:

http://www.brucefreem...

$1 suggested donation for the organizer fee
item.name: Bruce Freeman Rail Trail
